summary: Feature request to start workers in debug mode when the TEMPORAL_DEBUG environment variable is set, for consistency with other Temporal SDKs.
userImpact: Developers using Temporal SDKs across multiple languages would have a consistent debugging experience through environment variables.
proposedFix: Support TEMPORAL_DEBUG environment variable to automatically start workers in debug mode
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented to support TEMPORAL_DEBUG environment variable for starting workers in debug mode
keyQuote: I'd rather support this for consistency with the other SDKs.
